Content.Text:
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Morning, <MYNAME>! Haha, you look a
little sleepy. Be careful not to trip
and fall!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. In your line of
work, mornings are always busy, aren't
they? Don't overdo it, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! Let's seize the
day!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? Hey, have you heard
any interesting news? If so, please tell
me. I'm always looking for new stories!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bonjour, <MYNAME>! How's your work going?
Let's both do our best!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, <MYNAME>. News, news, news. Is there
any interesting news around here?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today was another long day, wasn't it?
I'm exhausted after working so hard.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Evening. It's easy to get sleepy around
this time, isn't it? I think my
battery's about to run out.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hi there, <MYNAME>! I found an interesting
story today. You should check it out in
the next edition of the newspaper.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You look full of
energy again today!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Recently, I can't
seem to work as well when I don't see
your face in the morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Seeing you now, I'm sure today is going
to go really well! Thanks!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Morning, <MYNAME>! I'm an honest person,
and I've got to say I can't help but
smile when I see you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good work today, <MYNAME>. We should talk
at least once a day! I'll feel kind of
lonely if we don't.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yoo-hoo, <MYNAME>. Ah! Did you maybe
possibly perhaps come to see me?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, even if it was just a coincidence,
you should say that you came to see me
because it'll make me happy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, how's work going? You look cool
when you're working, so keep it up!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good work today, <MYNAME>. Are you going
to relax a little now?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! <MYNAME>! I didn't think I'd get to
see you anymore today. I'm happy you're
here.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Evening, <MYNAME>. Hey, did anything
noteworthy happen today? If you don't
mind, I'd love to hear about your day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I want to know as much as I can about
your daily life. As your girlfriend, I
can't help but be curious!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Morning, <MYNAME>... For some reason, I
don't really feel like doing anything. I
guess maybe I'm still sleepy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did ya know
you were talking in your sleep pretty
loudly last night?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What? You want to know what you were
saying? That's a secret. It's one of
the privileges of being a wife!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>! I'm so lucky that
you're face is the first thing I see in
the morning.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I can't believe you, <MYNAME>. Even
though we live together, you didn't talk
to me at all in the morning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>You're supposed to show affection for
your wife! If you keep this up, then no
food for you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Working hard is good, but
you should remember to give your body a
break sometimes too.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Ugh, I'm tired again
today.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good job again today, <MYNAME>! You know,
I found an interesting piece of news
today. I'll tell you all about it later!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, do you think we'll be able to go to
bed together today? I'll do my best to
stay up, so try to get back early, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. The warm sun feels really
good today, doesn't it? It makes me want
to take it easy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? When you run around
in the rain, it's easy for your clothes
to get muddy, right?
<PAGE>
I like my job, so I don't mind running
around and getting muddy, but washing
off all the dirt can be a little tough.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there, <MYNAME>. It's hot again today,
isn't it? I'm already drenched in sweat.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>! The summer rain is pretty
exciting, isn't it?
<PAGE>
Don't you feel like you're going to come
across something new? I feel like I
might find a major scoop!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Don't you think the fall
sky is pretty no matter what time you
look at it?
<PAGE>
The sky being so beautiful must be why
they call fall the season of art. Well,
that's my little theory anyway.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Rainy fall days are really
quiet, aren't they? It's easy to write
articles on a day like this.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Brrr! It's cold again today, huh? My
breath is solid white. Haha. Your nose
is bright red, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>! It's really cold today with
this snow falling, huh?
<PAGE>
Doesn't the snow make you feel restless?
I mean, I just can't sit still. Some
people say that's childish, but...

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The weather is terrible, isn't it? Even
I'm not crazy enough to run around
during a typhoon... I want to though.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The weather is terrible, isn't it? Even
I'm not crazy enough to run around
in a snowstorm... I want to though.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This wind is unbelievable... On the farm
these are the types of days when you
can't afford to make mistakes, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, be careful when you go out,
alright? I'll prepare a nice relaxing
bath for you to come home to.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, surely you don't have to go out
and work on a day like this? You'll just
worry me if you do.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard the news, <MYNAME>! You're in a
relationship! What's that? How did I
know?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Don't underestimate my sources! Anyway,
you look so happy. I'm jealous! I wish
you two all the happiness in the world!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A lot of places here look like fun
places for children to play. If I were a
kid, I'd probably love it here.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love the forest air. I feel like my
body is being rejuvenated. It's no
wonder visiting the forest is popular.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Riverbanks are always so beautiful. This
area has especially nice scenery, so I
come here to take pictures sometimes.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you come here to fish, <MYNAME>? I
hope you catch a big one. If you do, let
me write an article about it, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This lake feels mysterious, right? I get
a strong sense that there's something
here! Like some kind of rare life form.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are a lot of wild animals in this
area, so I come here often when I'm
writing a feature article on wildlife.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Animals are interesting because they're
always full of new surprises.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People say that farms seem like laid
back places, but I see them as strong
and dependable.
<PAGE>
They just feel so full of life. Well, I
guess maybe I feel that way about this
farm because it belongs to you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Has anything newsworthy happened on the
farm? Like a new crop mutation or an
animal that's learned a special trick...

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, if you find a newsworthy mineral in
this mine, let me know, okay?!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't these types of dark places make
you want to tell scary stories? Oh, I've
got a good one for you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm, this town still doesn't have very
many people, does it?
<PAGE>
I finish delivering the newspaper in no
time at all. It'd be nice if things were
a bit more challenging.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's taken some time to get to this
point, but I feel like this town has
gotten more lively recently!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Now my job is more challenging. It's
more fun too!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All of a sudden there are a lot more
people in this town, aren't there?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Now I get to gather a lot of different
information from a big group of various
people. Every day is so satisfying!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so happy that the town has been
revived! While my work may be far busier
now, it also feels more meaningful.
<PAGE>
Of course, I've always liked this town,
but now that it's so lively and
exciting, I love it!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rumors, personal connections, and
notepads are where scoops come from! Let
me know if you have any news, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My new hobby is collecting things, like
news magazines from all over the world
and disguises for undercover reporting.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hmm...That stuff's mostly for work! I
really do enjoy collecting it though.
This must be the perfect job for me.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This job has improved my memory a lot!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>That's good, but I remember failures I'd
rather forget too... And when those
memories come back, I feel embarrassed.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come from a big family of 7 children,
and I'm the oldest. That's why I'm a
master at changing diapers.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fear overruns the danger! It's better
to take positive steps forward than to
constantly worry about what to do!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My father was a reporter too. He was
almost never home, but he wrote amazing
articles, and I always read them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I respect my father, and I want to
become a reporter like him and write
truly exciting articles!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think the best thing about coming to
this town was meeting you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'll do whatever I can to help you!
Let's be friends forever!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ahhh, I'm so bored. I wonder if anything
interesting is going on.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>... do you enjoy being with me?
I can't really tell anymore.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, we're a couple now, but
sometimes our relationship still feels
like it's just between regular friends.
<PAGE>
Well, I'm not complaining though. Let's
take it slow and not rush into things.
We've got plenty of time!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I sent a letter to my family about
our relationship, they replied with "do
you have a fever or something?"
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>They're so rude. Sure, I focused on work
up until now, but I'm still a girl.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since we started going out, I've been
paying more attention to my looks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>I'd be embarrassed if you saw what my
skin is like after I've been working on
an article until midnight.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you never get angry and complain
about the way I run around all the time
for my job. Actually, you support me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>That patient kindness of yours is
probably the thing I like most about
you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't think I could keep running
around anymore if I didn't have you,
<MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>That's how important you are to me. So
please always stay by my side, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Want something, <MYNAME>? I'm thinking
about something now, so can we talk
some other time?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
... It was fun when we were going out,
wasn't it? Lately, I've been thinking
a lot about those times!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You haven't been finding me boring
recently, have you? I feel like we
haven't been seeing each other much.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, don't you think I've mellowed out
a little since we got married?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It must be true that when you have
someone to care for, you take better
care of yourself too.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've always liked housework, but now I
find myself liking it more than ever.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It feels good to be able to support you
in so many different ways!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, I feel so warm inside whenever I
see your face. This must be what it
means to feel completed by someone else.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
My feelings for you grow deeper and
deeper every day, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I derive great joy from that. Thank you
for making me a happy woman!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! This is sort of embarrassing, isn't
it? I can feel my heart beating.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>Well, let's do our best from here on out
to make lots of wonderful memories!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
... We may not be able to do it right
away, but from here on out, let's build
a new relationship as friends!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I never thought I'd be able to get back
together with you, <MYNAME>. Let's make
lots of fun memories this time!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I can't believe you're my fiancé now,
<MYNAME>. My heart's beating even harder
now than when we started going out.
<PAGE>
Ever since you proposed to me I've been
ecstatic! I think I might go crazy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Being newlyweds is a unique feeling,
isn't it? I'm so happy. I wish this
feeling would last forever!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've got a baby in my belly now, so I
have to be careful not to trip and fall
while I'm working!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm definitely gonna have a healthy
baby. You can count on it!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My belly's started sticking out,
hasn't it? I'm glad because that means
the baby is growing healthily.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so excited about meeting our baby
that I can hardly stand it. I hope the
baby comes soon!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the baby cries at night, just leave
it to me! I've never been so grateful to
have been born the oldest of 7 children!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When children start crawling around,
they get much more active and difficult.
We've both got to be careful, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> sure has gotten big, and more and
more like you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You must have been just as cute when you
were little!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hey, <MYNAME>, let's all three of us keep
enjoying happy, fun days as a family.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah! A <ITEMNAME0>! You
remembered that this is my
favorite!
<PAGE>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>. I'll
gratefully savor every bite!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love this! Is it really alright for me
to have it?! Thank you so much, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like this a lot! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow! Is this for me? Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A present? For me? Are you sure
it's alright for me to have this?
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
If this is for me, I'll take it... but
this really isn't a good present for me,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ahhh! It, it, it's an orange devil! I'm
pretty sure that I'd rather not get this
present ever again.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! I'm so lucky to be getting this!
Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is huge! It must have been pretty
difficult to grow this! Thanks.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'll be. You made this thing grow
pretty big. Thanks.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ugh! It looks even worse when it's big.
Um... never mind, I was talking to
myself. Thanks anyway.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wh-Whoa! I can't believe you grew this,
<MYNAME>! On top of that, it also looks
delicious.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm going to try to
write an article about this!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It-It's huge! What the heck is this?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>The sheer size of this thing shocked me
at first! Thank you.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It-It's huge! What the heck is this?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Ugh, I can't believe what I'm seeing.
This is horrific.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Are you picking on me? This must
be a bad dream!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Umm, I appreciate this, but I can't
accept it right now.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Umm, I appreciate this, but I can't
accept it right now.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Umm, I appreciate this, but I can't
accept it right now.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't exactly take two presents in the
same day, ya know. Maybe some other
time, okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you! But I can't take two presents
in the same day. It's the thought that
counts, so I'm okay with just that!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you! But I can't take two presents
in the same day. It's the thought that
counts, so I'm okay with just that!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present?! And it's
a <ITEMNAME0>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>This is the best birthday present I've
gotten this year! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present?! And it's
something I really like!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Nice choice, <MYNAME>! I truly appreciate
this!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present?! And it's
something I really like!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thank you, <MYNAME>! You've made me very
happy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? A birthday present?! Thanks,
<MYNAME>. I appreciate it!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present?! You didn't
have to go to all this trouble. But
thanks anyway.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present?! But you
know...
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Oh, never mind, it's nothing. Thanks
anyway, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Um, today's my birthday, right? So, um,
there's no need to bring this orange
devil here...
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>But you went through all the trouble of
getting it. I at least appreciate the
sentiment. Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present?! Whoa,
it's a <ITEMNAME0>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Did you get this just for me? Thank you,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? A birthday present?! Wow! It's
so big! Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What? A birthday present?! Um... well,
it is pretty big. Thanks.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? A birthday present?! Why did it
have to be so big?! Oh, never mind.
Thanks anyway.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wh-Whoa, a <ITEMNAME0>! Did you
prepare this especially for me because
it's my birthday?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm so happy to get
such a wonderful present!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It-It's huge! Did you go through all
this trouble because it's my birthday?
Thank you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What the heck is this?! I can't believe
I'm getting this for my birthday... I
guess luck is not on my side.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? A <ITEMNAME0>? How could
something so terrible happen to me on my
birthday? Sigh.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, it's a chick! She's super cute! Let
me hold her too!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This chicken kind of looks like you,
<MYNAME>. It must be true that animals
resemble their owners!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow! That's a big chicken. It's so
impressive that it's actually kind of
scary.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, a dog. Come here you. Good doggy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This fellow is too fat, don't you think?
Come on <MYNAME>, you've got to make sure
the little guy stays healthy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, a dog. Come here you. Good doggy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This fellow is too fat, don't you think?
Come on <MYNAME>, you've got to make sure
the big guy stays healthy.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A cat! Haha! I just love touching these
soft paws!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>, isn't this cat too fat? It's
a shame because the little guy would
look cute otherwise.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A cat! Haha! I just love touching these
soft paws!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>, isn't this cat too fat? It's
a shame because the little guy would
look cute otherwise.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, is this a Flower Festival present?
Anyway, this flower is beautiful!
Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha ha, is this a Flower Festival
present? Wow, it's very beautiful. And
it smells wonderful too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>It's kind of embarrassing to get a
flower from my boyfriend on a day like
this. But I appreciate it... Thanks.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A Flower Festival present? It's
beautiful. Did you prepare this just for
me? Thank you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>You know, <MYNAME>, I was happy when we
were dating, but you've made me even
happier now.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A Harmony Day present? You're very
thoughtful, <MYNAME>! Thank you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! A Harmony Day present? A gift like
